name: Golden Triangle with Extended Rajasthan
description: A shining example of the captivating past and the present of India is the Golden Triangle. For it encompass all a traveller could dream of from architectural marvels to vibrant cultures, natural beauty to grand palaces and rejuvenating locations. To top it, you get to experience the rustic and colourful rural life. Embark on a transcendental journey with this tour.
